sentence: Washington Commanders: Matt Corral, QB, Ole Miss Washington’s quarterback issues continued in 2021: Ryan Fitzpatrick missed all but two quarters of the season with a hip injury, and Taylor Heinicke was OK in his first full season as a starter.

sentence: “If you look at my stats, they weren’t particularly good in the beginning of the season, but once I got with Ryan Fitzpatrick it was like ‘Fitz Magic.’” Owens made 55 catches for 829 yards and five touchdowns with the Bills, and had some particularly memorable plays with Fitzpatrick.

title: Former Bills WR Terrell Owens Scores TD in First Game of Pro Comeback
